periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 63. Southwest wind around 20 mph.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Slight Chance Rain Showers
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 3am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 62. Southwest wind 21 to 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a high near 65. Southwest wind around 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 60. Southwest wind 18 to 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Rain Likely
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 10am, then rain likely between 10am and 4pm, then a chance of rain showers. Cloudy. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 17 to 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 10pm. Partly cloudy. Low around 49, with temperatures rising to around 53 overnight. Chance of precipitation is 40%.
